name: LibriFox
tagline: A fully functional port of LibriVox for Firefox OS
body:
### LibriFox

LibriFox is a fully functional port of LibriVox for Firefox OS. More information will be coming soon!


### GitHub Repo
If you'd like to contribute, please post comments, pull requests, and issues on our [GitHub Repo](https://github.com/fccardiff/LibriFox/)!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
